name: Current Username on Navigation Label
author: Al-Mamun Talukder

sections.description: This plugin allows you to display current username [Display Name] on wordpress menu navigation label or title attribute. Just use [current-username] shortcode. You can also use other shortcode on your navigation label and tittle attributes.
sections.installation:
1. Add the plugin’s folder in the WordPress’ plugin directory.
  2. Activate the plugin.
  3. You can now use [current-username] shortcode on your wordpress menu navigation label or title attributes
  4. You can also use other shortcodes in those areas as well.

short_description: This plugin allows you to display current username (Display Name) on wordpress menu navigation label or title attribute.
